lines.text: That dress does things for you. Doesn't do me any harm either.
It's nights like these that drive men like me to women like you for nights like this.
The closer I get to death the more I realize that I love you.
The closer I get to death the more I realize I love me, too.
When I look into a girl's eyes, I can tell just what she thinks of me. It's pretty discouraging, too.
I ain't got no friends in Washington; I voted Republican.
